name: Dot Eater
description:
[HOW TO PLAY]
- Eat smaller dots
- Try to create the biggest dot possible
- Avoid bigger dots

[FEATURES]
- NEW teleport feature: use teleport to move yourself instantly!
- New io
- Improved performance

Have fun!

Please send us any feedback you have. We take it very seriously.
Follow our Facebook and VK pages "Tiny Games!"
